summary: A carefree afternoon at the beach turns into a comic misadventure when three young Japanese men are mistaken for illegal Korean residents.
cast: Kazuhiko Kato|Osamu Kitayama|Norihiko Hashida|Kei Satô|Cha Dei-dang|Fumio Watanabe|Mako Midori|Hôsei Komatsu|Taiji Tonoyama|Masao Adachi|Takashi Ueno|Rokkô Toura
title: Kaette kita yopparai
